name: Aviator Training Center
about: At Aviator Training Center, located on the north side of Lantana Airport in South Florida, we offer a comprehensive and affordable flight training experience. As a FAA-certified Part 141 and Part 61 program, we provide competitive prices, fast-track programs, and a safe learning environment. Our highly qualified and patient flight instructors are dedicated to helping you achieve your pilot goals. We cater to your schedule with full staff availability 7 days a week. By owning our own aircraft and performing our own maintenance, we keep costs low for our students. Whether you're starting with a discovery flight or pursuing a private pilot certificate, Aviator Training Center is committed to making your aviation dreams a reality.
services:

Intro Flight
Commercial
